name: Picross X: Picbits vs. Uzboross
description:
Survive by solving non-stop problems!
This time, Picross is a 5x5 size high speed puzzle!
Enjoy a new sensation of pop and thrilling picross!
Supports local and online communication!
Cooperate with friends or strangers to defeat Uzboross!

You can freely change the design of the game screen and dress up your character!
If you have play data for "Picross S Series" or "Working Zombies", you can get a special skin as a linked bonus!

  • "Picross" is a "picture crossword puzzle game" where you complete illustrations using numbers as hints.
    With simple and easy-to-understand rules, anyone can enjoy it easily.
